name: Dolphin Folder View Settings File
summary: Learn about .DOLPHINVIEW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The KDE3 version of Dolphin uses DOLPHINVIEW files to store view settings for directories, while the KDE4 version uses standard .DIRECTORY files.

description: Stores viewing preferences for a folder in Dolphin, a file manager for KDE (K Desktop Environment); contains window settings, such as icon positions and view mode; typically hidden by default.
